name: Cell System Markup Language(CSML)Project
short_description: The Cell System Markup Language (CSML) is an XML format for modeling, visualizing and simulating biopathways. CSML supports to represent several pathway types including metabolic, signaling, genetic regulatory pathways, and cell-cell interactions.
